alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 04 at 5:46AM CDT until September 04 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Middle Tennessee, including the following counties, Coffee and Grundy. * WHEN...Until 800 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 545 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms moving slowly across eastern Coffee and Grundy Counties. Radar estimates between 1 and 5 inches of rain have fallen overnight in this area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gruetli-Laager, Tracy City, Altamont, Coalmont, Palmer, Beersheba Springs, Pelham and Hillsboro. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
